title: Enjoy Scenic Views in This 2BR/1BA Apartment w/ a Private Patio!
posting_body: ['Emory Apartment Homes', 'CALL US:', 'show contact info', 'x532', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'Two Bedroom One Bath  2 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 795 Sq.', 'Ft / Please Call', 'Location, Style, and Value, All Right Here', 'This two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment at Emory stuns with wood-style flooring, plush carpeting, and a private patio or balcony that features scenic property views.', 'Take note of interior details like ceiling fans and tasteful window treatments.', 'When you’re ready to unwind, enjoy a dip in the pool or relax in the barbecue area with neighbors.', 'Call today to learn more!', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '* Ceiling Fan', '*', 'Large Closets', '* Air Conditioning', '* Hardwood Flooring', '* Patio', '* Balcony', '* Range', '* Refrigerator', '* Dishwasher', '* Window Coverings', '*', 'Individual Climate Control', 'Property Amenities:', '* Pool', '* Gas BBQ Grills', '* Clubhouse', '* Fitness Center', '* Playground', '* Night Patrol', '* Laundry Facility', '* Covered Parking', '* Package Receiving', '* On-site Maintenance', '* On-site Management', '* Freeway Access', '* Online Payments Available', '* Transportation', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x532', 'Emory Apartment Homes', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', "5100 O'Bannon Drive Las Vegas, NV 89146", 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
